name: To The Top (itch) (Guigz)
description:
Made in less than 24 hours

Credits:

  • Sprites: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack
  • Music: https://opengameart.org/content/puppy-playing-in-the-garden-sms-port

How to play:

  • A/D or arrow keys: move
  • Hold Spacebar to charge, release to jump
